div.p:
ARMY AIR BASE
HUNTER FIELD
SAVANNAH, GEORGIA

Everything nice happened today.
Had a nice long letter from you +
received pictures of the boys and my
Staff Sgt. Didn't have to wait as long
for that rating. I had a letter from
Peggy + Mildred yesterday + Peggy said
they were going to K.C. Wanted to know
what I wanted to do with my things.
Wish they had told me that when I
was there so I could have taken care
of them myself.

Had you said something to Jimmy
to hurt his feelings in that picture
by himself? Thelma (the first sgt.) + I
room together and she gets the biggest
kick out of the boys pictures, calls
Jimmy the devils imp. She is rather
tall + her hair is almost red.
We get along well. Her boyfriend

ARMY AIR BASE
HUNTER FIELD
SAVANNAH, GEORGIA

is leaving soon. Every time I
get up from my desk she never
fails to say "Where are you going?"
I stayed all night with Mama Lou
Burton while on furlough + saw Jim
+ he got a divorce. I had him
scared. I told him it wasn't worth
a dime as long as I was in service
+ he didn't {struck through sign the] have me sign
the papers. But I am glad he did.
I think I will ask for a transfer
later but I can't get any farther
than Colo. unless I can get out of the
third Air Force.

I get paid Sept. 10 this month as
I was red lined + then I'll send you
a package. I think we are going
to be able to wear civilian clothes
off duty. I am not sure yet.

ARMY AIR BASE
HUNTER FIELD
SAVANNA, GEORGIA

Does G.W. like his work? What does
he do? I guess I am just as well
off here in the army. I make $96.00
now. All of my clothes, rent, food,
transportation, doctor + dentist. I
don't know where I can make that
in civilian life. Do you? I think I
am pretty well liked here. Every
one treats me swell + I get along
with Quartermaster. That is where
we get our supplies.

It is still awfully hot here but
I do hope it turns cool soon.
Write often for that is all we
can do + we are so far away
that is all that we can do.

S/Sgt. Ann Smith
A700158
762nd WAC Post Hg. Co
Hunter Field, Ga.

Mrs. G. W. Carlstead
413 Alleghany
Vallejo Calif
